name: v1.7.3
body:
## ❗ BreakingChange
Due to the fact that fasthttp, which fiber is based on in release [1.41.0](https://github.com/valyala/fasthttp/releases/tag/v1.41.0), does not support go versions 1.14 & 1.15 anymore, we had to remove them from our fiber package with release [v2.40.0](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/releases/tag/v2.40.0) and also from this package 

## 🧹 Updates

- Bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.40.0 to 2.40.1 (#209)
- update fiber to 1.40.0 (#208)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gofiber/template/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

name: v1.7.2
body:
## 🧹 Updates


- Bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from  2.37.1 to 2.39.0 (#195, #199)
- Bump dependabot/fetch-metadata from 1.3.4 to 1.3.5 (#202)
- Bump lewagon/wait-on-check-action from 1.1.2 to 1.2.0 (#200)
- Bump actions/checkout from 3.0.2 to 3.1.0 (#196)

## 🐛 Fixes

- Handlebars: Ensure we bind custom helpers only once on Engine Reload (Handlebars) (#206)
- Handlebars \& Mustache: Fix issue with variable bindings missing in layouts for Handlebars \& Mustache engines (#204)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gofiber/template/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

name: v1.6.10
body:
## 🧹 Updates

- Bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.9.0 to 2.10.0 (#118)
- Clarify error message and print template error for Jet templates (#113)

name: v1.6.9
body:
## 🧹 Updates

- Bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.7.1 to 2.9.0 (#114)

## 📚 Documentation

name: v1.6.8
body:
## 🧹 Updates

- mustache: add missing support for partials for embedded filesystems (#104)
- Upgrading Jet templating engine to V6 (#82)
- Bump github.com/CloudyKit/jet/v6 from 6.0.2 to 6.1.0 (#100)
- Bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.5.0 to 2.7.1 (#98, #108)


## 📚 Documentation

- Add html unescape values example (#105)
- Add html embed.FS example (#102)

Thank you @malusev998 and @zachmann for making this update possible.

name: v1.6.7
body:
🧹  Updates
- Support for go 1.16 embed package #93

🩹  Fixes
- Mustache: variables can be used in template but not layout #84
- Incorrect `baseDir` for django with `embed` support #95

name: v1.6.1
body:
- Bump django v4
- Bump jet v3.0.1
- Bump fiber v2.0.1

- Fix workflow test

name: v1.5.0
body:
- Fix reload issue https://github.com/gofiber/template/issues/11 https://github.com/gofiber/template/pull/12
- Add support for embedded file systems https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/422
See https://github.com/gofiber/template#embedded-systems for examples

name: v1.4.1
body:
- Fix panic for nil map in `handlebars`
- Add support for layouts https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/441
- `engine.Reload(enabled bool)`
- `engine.Debug(enabled bool)`
- `engine.Layout(key string)`
- `engine.Delims(left, right string)`
- `engine.AddFunc(name string, fn interface{})`

name: v1.3.2
body: `engine.Parse()` can be used to reload/reparse/refresh the templates.
